Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: coblenis
Reviews.Content: Had this same phone for more than 2 years and loved it After much abuse, it was dying and so glad to have found the same one.  Great touchscreen, Super GPS, all the features you need.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: PhD2012
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived on time and was in great working condition. This was much better then the insurance plan. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Not happy with seller
Reviews.Author: Toni Moracco
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone on Amazon, through Just Cellular. I ordered the new phone but it did not come in its original box, it does not look brand new, it did not come with the manual book for the phone, and it did not come with its original phone charger, the charger is different and only about 2 feet long, very short compared to normal chargers, its the cheap charger that they have for sell for $5, so I guess they take the nice one out of the box from your new phone and give you the cheap crappy charger so they can sell the other one for a better price, not sure. It did ship on the 4th of the 3 to 5 day business shipping days so that was good. So far the phone is working well but if I need another phone I will not be ordering it through Just Cellular, and I would advise others not to as well

Reviews.Title: Phone is great
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because my I was i need of a new one, and i wanted a touch. the phone its self is great and looked cool and lean. however this phone is a smart phone so you will need data to put in to use.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: jess.sargent
Reviews.Content: The phone didn't work and so I sent it back and got a full refund. The company itself had very good customer service.

Reviews.Title: dont like it
Reviews.Author: Fumi "angelove183"
Reviews.Content: got this for my father who needed a replacement phone for work and this is one that he cant wait to get rid of. the slide screen is frustrating because you have to slide to answer but you miss more calls then receive them because it is so hard to slide. you swipe your finger till you want to throw the dang thing. other then that, the screens are weird and not like any that ive ever had. most screens are at least similar in their settings but this one was not.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone!!!
Reviews.Author: L Vogel
Reviews.Content: This phone is terrible. Its slow, it has nothing to offer, the touch screen is so off everything you do on it is frustrating. I pretty much went without a phone the entire 4 weeks I used this one. It was gonna serve as a replacement, but instead just held me over until I found a better replacement! I would NOT recommend this phone to ANYONE!

Reviews.Title: Instinct 2
Reviews.Author: Evette
Reviews.Content: As far as phones go it is pretty nice easy to use .. However buyer beware it is considered a smartphone and requires a data package.. not just a texting one.. the sprint people at first told my daughter it didn't but they changed my plan to data so upon deeper investigation I found out that it was in fact a smartphone.. so as far as phones go it is a great buy for the money but only if you want a full data package.

Reviews.Title: SUCKS!!!
Reviews.Author: JessieLou
Reviews.Content: This phone is the crappiest little phone I have ever had. It does not have a "home" screen with like a background picture. The camera SUCKS soo bad. You can't zoom, it has no flash, and it has this "fuzzy picture warning" that pops up everytime you go to take a picture that takes like 5 minutes to go away. You can only set an alarm for MON-FRI or Sat & Sun. You can't customize it to only go off on say a Wednesday only. For text messages the phone plays an ENTIRE ringtone, just like when you're getting a phone call. You can't mute the text messages without muting the ringtone. The phone makes an annoying ticking every time you hit a button if the volume is on, so to avoid it the volume has to always be off. You can only have 150 characters PER text message. So if you use more than that, unlike a normal phone, you have to send that message before you can finish what you are saying. Its ridiculous. It's the most technilogically unadvanced phone I've seen in a long time. The seller was great, got my package when I was supposed to with no issues. But the phone itself is crap. Wouldn't reccomend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung S30 SPH-M810 Instinct 2,
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Really like this phone.  easy to use. although not a smart phone does what I needed to do.  This is my second phone 1st one bit the bullet after 2 yrs.  cheap price that does a good job have not any issues such as dropped calls.

Reviews.Title: Good attempt, horrible execution
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: This phone would be good if it didn't stop working after, oh, say two months.  Camera doesn't work, it freezes and resets itself, deletes all your messages or contacts.  Erases the SD card (twice now), but it is kinda durable.  Otherwise, lousy phone.

Reviews.Title: Defective Product
Reviews.Author: RRM
Reviews.Content: Product was defective.  The power on and off button would stay stuck and would shut off by itself. I returned it to the vendor and did receive a full refund.

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE SUCKS!!!!
Reviews.Author: JAMAICA TREASURES
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE SUCKS IT KEEPS ON TURNING ON AND OFF AND IT DONT GIVE YOU MANY CHOICES TO PERSONALIZE THE PHONE.....PLEASE DONT BUY!

Reviews.Title: the phone
Reviews.Author: princess
Reviews.Content: the phone came with a case. but the phone screen has a white spoy on it. sometimes it freezes. i hope it dont break cause i would of judt wasted money

Reviews.Title: eh
Reviews.Author: megzz
Reviews.Content: needed a cheap phone and this got me through the rest of my trip but died shortly after I returned home

Reviews.Title: Oh my goodness what a skunk this one is!!!
Reviews.Author: Susan M Livecy
Reviews.Content: this was an old phone that should have a warning on it that will drop calls because it does not have the strength in it to hear or keep calls going anymore. not high tech enough. It came scratched. But more it was too old. not a good buy. Buy newer folks. not a good buy

Reviews.Title: No Charger!
Reviews.Author: Tyler R. "Tyler R."
Reviews.Content: Who sends a phone without a phone charger!??????? Very upset by that! Spent lots of time searching for a charger cause it was different from the standard micro USB

Reviews.Title: dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Renee Ligman
Reviews.Content: this phone did not even last 2 weeks.  You could not make calls or do anything and it just shut off.  I do not blame seller this is a Sprint phone issue.  Sofar all of their phones stink in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: hannah hassell
Reviews.Content: I chose 3 because i thought it was a smart phone and it wasnt and I needed a phone badly so it works for now.

Reviews.Title: erika venezuela
Reviews.Author: erika
Reviews.Content: pedi un telefono liberado para venezuela y este es tecnologia CDMA, con la cual ya no trabajan en mi pais.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: josie2012
Reviews.Content: My husband always breaking his phones, I have no money to keep buying expensive phones with sprint,the insurance not give you new phone.so decided to try this phone, came before of schedule,I have this phone for 3 months, internet is not the best of all ,  but is good for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Let down
Reviews.Author: Erica M. Schroeder "health nut"
Reviews.Content: Its not like the other samsung phones I have purchased. Small screen but ok for my son to use for now.

Reviews.Title: Samsung products are top notch
Reviews.Author: James Rocke
Reviews.Content: You cannot go wrong with any Samsung product.  The cell phone is no exception.  It is easy to setup and on the Sprint network in minutes.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Outdated and awkward to use. Also has old power cord not  compatible with common charger that just about every other phone now uses.  The battery died on me and getting replacement was going to take a week so I just got a new phone instead

Reviews.Title: wont keep a charge
Reviews.Author: denise fulton
Reviews.Content: The phone was in great condition .... until you try to charge it? it does not stay charged long and even with it on the charger all night ?

Reviews.Title: very poor quality
Reviews.Author: Robin Kellam
Reviews.Content: don't buy, the quality is awful and it has already broken. it IS a smart phone, even though amazon  will tell you no, so cell bill went up double

Reviews.Title: new phone
Reviews.Author: deann
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the money!  Only complaint is the battery only holds a charge for about 24 hours so recharging nitely!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Telly Rivenburgh
Reviews.Content: Good phone, everything was as expected-new, excellent condition-no issues-great phone for the price.  call, text, email  and watch ESPN on it.

Reviews.Title: I can`t use that
Reviews.Author: Alonso Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: The phone can`t be used in venezuela because is locked, the phone company said its impossible activate the number phone number, help me please, what i can do?

ProductInfo.Features:
This touch display lets you see the big picture without eye strain and squinting.
Get audible turn-by-turn directions to any destination, whether it's a quick trip or a road trip.
The Instinct's IM capabilities make keeping in touch with friends easy and instant, no matter where you are.
Experience the Web in its full color glory with a full HTML web browser. Now you can surf the Web in style and comfort, right from your phone.
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No Contract Required
Calendar Sync lets you sync your phone with your Outlook® calendar so you'll never miss an appointment or meeting.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung S30 SPH-M810 Instinct 2, Colbalt Metal Blue (Sprint) CDMA - No Contract Required
